scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:js && yarn build:ts
scripts.build:js: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o index.js --keep-case googleapis/google/rpc/code.proto googleapis/google/rpc/status.proto googleapis/google/rpc/error_details.proto
scripts.test: (path-exists index.js && path-exists index.d.ts && echo "PASS file index.js is exists") || (echo "FAIL file index.js not exist" && exit 1)
